name: The Ides of March
description:
Submission for Mini Jam 51 - Rome

The premise of the game is pretty simple. You're Caesar. Don't get stabbed!

  • Arrow Keys for movement.
  • Space or Click for everything else.

I initially wanting things to be way more complex. Obstacles, enemy pathfinding, enemies not overlapping, player could dodge / roll out of the way. Then I got busy. Somehow during this COVID-19 lockdown I got too busy to just make something for 3 days straight. Oh, well! Hope you all enjoy this, even if it is really simple!
